prompts: Create a small bird Pokemon that has bright green feathers and a cheerful demeanor.
I want to design a Pokemon that has a unique mix of psychic powers and avian traits.
Generate a flying-type Pokemon that resembles a tiny green bird with red accents.
Make a Pokemon with a round body, small wings, and a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can be found in forests and grasslands, with vibrant green colors.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of both psychic and flying types, with cute features.
Give me a detailed description of a tiny bird Pokemon with a green body and a yellow beak.
